source_caption_data.pre_caption: From a stationary, wide-angle, first-person perspective, the scene is viewed through a wooden structure that creates a frame-within-a-frame, with dark vertical supports on the left and right. In the center foreground, a chainsaw chain moves vertically downwards, cutting through a horizontal wooden beam that extends across the middle ground. As the chain cuts, the beam splinters and separates in the center of the frame. Through the structure, a paved lot and a white ramp are visible in the middle ground, with industrial buildings and a hill range in the background under a cloudy sky. A black object is fixed in the bottom foreground of the shot.

The caption also misses specifying the initial shot size, which appears to be a medium shot focused on the cutting mechanism, and omits the crucial detail that the camera is positioned at a high angle, looking down onto the beam.
